name: Head 2 Head Tic Tac Toe
description:
This is the simplest version of Tic Tac Toe available for people of all ages.

Tic Tac Toe is a fun, fast, and intuitive game that you can play with your friends or family anytime,anywhere.

It’s the only Tic Tac Toe designed with Youngsters on the Noggin!

Who will be the first to get three in a row? Good luck!
